show.subtitle: Dr. Len and Nurse Vicki discuss various natural and holistic health topics while taking your calls.
show.title: Prescriptions For Health

title: Prescriptions For Health
content:
What new breakthrough in medical science can solve the problem of hospital acquired MRSA infections? <!--more--> What common food feeds colds and flus?
What common food predisposes us to cancer?
Is there a new drug that can prevent Alzheimer’s Disease?
When should blood pressure not be treated?
